verses.name: Hebrews 6:14
verses.text: Saying, Surely blessing I will bless thee, and multiplying I will multiply thee.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:15
verses.text: And so, after he had patiently endured, he obtained the promise.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:16
verses.text: For men verily swear by the greater: and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:17
verses.text: Wherein God, willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel, confirmed it by an oath:

verses.name: Hebrews 6:18
verses.text: That by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us:
